name: Adventure (itch) (b._.render)
description:
Controls:

a/d or dpad left/right: run left / right

space or (x,a):  jump

s or dpad down: shrink

Find the finish line and Spawn at the next level

I used art by pixel frog  https://pixelfrog-assets.itch.io/

This game is an expiremental prototype and therefore may not run at all
